title: It looks like an iPhone, but it’s half the size and price on Black Friday eve
content:
Macworld

Does size matter? Apple thinks bigger means better, even though we’ve been begging for iPhone minis for years. Guess we’ll have to settle for this other mini smartphone while we wait for them to get their act together.

Besides, the NanoPhone is only $89.97 with free shipping for Black Friday (reg. $199.99). Apple would probably charge ten times that. Full disclosure: It runs on Android OS, but there’s a bucket of reasons to take a bite of the forbidden fruit. Keep on reading.

You might not use the NanoPhone as a main device, but its 3.5” by 1.8” design is perfect for travel and sports, or as an emergency backup phone when your iPhone dies. Simply pop out your current SIM card for 4G connectivity, or purchase a new mobile data plan through your carrier.

Eventually, you’ll get used to Android 10 OS. Add all your favorite apps like Instagram, Facebook, WhatsApp, and YouTube.

Order your tiny smartphone for $89.97 with free shipping during this Black Friday sale. No coupon is needed to save 55%.
